title: Pixel 3 won't connect to wifi. Tried all solutions, they don't work. What to do?
content:
I've tried all solutions (safe mode, network data reset, factory reset, router factory reset, disconnected all other wifi devices, etc.).

This issue started yesterday morning after the phone charged overnight.  Have not dropped it, it hasn't been submerged it in water, it hasn't been shocked with electricity - it's has a very well cared for life.  

My Chromebook and Chromium device both connect to wifi no problem.  Issue isn't router.

Google says to return to them for a new one, but I'll be without a phone for 8-10 business days.

Is there any other fix that can be recommended?
